head.title: Utilize the Comparison API to compare {{FileFormatUp}} documents using Java.
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides an API to obtain detailed document comparison reports in various Java applications, including J2EE and J2SE.

header.title: {{FileFormatUp}} document comparison in Java applications
header.description: {{ProdShortName}} API for getting and displaying differences in {{FileFormatUp}} documents using applications based on Java, J2EE, and J2SE. Easily obtain detailed reports for a brilliant experience.
header.subtitle: Documents comparing framework

about.title: Explore the capabilities of {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} is an intrinsic Java API crafted for comparing multiple images and documents sharing the same format. It assists in identifying variations within paragraphs, words, characters, shapes, and even text styles among the compared documents. With the capability to merge these alterations and export to a final document, it facilitates the comparison and merging of PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Visio diagrams, Outlook emails, HTML, drawings, and various image file formatsâ€”eliminating the necessity for any external libraries.

steps.title: How to compare several {{FileFormatUp}} documents using Java

content.title: Use [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) to compare multiple {{FileFormatUp}} files and generate a report detailing their differences
content.step_1: Use your preferred package manager to install {{ProdFullName}} from [{{PackageStoreName}}]({{PackageUrl}})
content.step_2: Create an instance of the Comparer class setting path to one of {{FileFormatUp}} files
content.step_3: Add at least one additional {{FileFormatUp}} to the Comparer instance
content.step_4: Receive a detailed final report outlining the exact differences

comments.comment_1: Check files from your hard drive for differences or similarities
comments.comment_2: Create a Comparer object by specifying the initial file
comments.comment_4: Get the report with the specified name as the result

formats.title: Compare various documents using {{ProgLang}}
formats.description: Our Java API allows you to compare documents of various formats. Stay updated on document changes by processing them effortlessly.

head.title: Use the Comparison API along with Java to compare PDF documents.
head.description: The {{ProdShortName}} Java API creates detailed reports for PDF documents in applications that support J2EE and J2SE.

header.title: Comparing PDF documents using Java applications
header.description: The {{ProdShortName}} Java API provides detailed comparison reports for PDF documents in various kinds of applications that use J2EE or J2SE.

about.title: Find out {{ProdFullName}} API advantages
about.content: Genuine {{ProdFullName}} API is developed crafted for composing reports full of useful data about differences inside PDF documents. Not only differences in text within paragraphs or words but also changes in shapes and text styles are represented at final report. Merging these alterations and exporting to a final document available too. In fact, there no need in external libraries. Only a few lines of code grant access to rich functionality.

steps.title: Comparing multiple PDF docs via Java

content.title: Compare PDFs with [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) and get reports about documents distinctions
content.step_1: Download {{ProdFullName}} package from [{{PackageStoreName}}]({{PackageUrl}}) and install it
content.step_2: New Comparer instance must has path to one of PDF files
content.step_3: At least one PDF document must be provided for comparison
content.step_4: Result report is saved to provided path

comments.comment_1: Getting report about changes at PDFs
comments.comment_2: Pass first file path to Comparer constructor
comments.comment_4: Save distinctions report for future analyzing

formats.title: Find any changes at PDF files via Java
formats.description: Our Java API provides possibility to control PDF files versions by generating precise and detailed report in your favorite format.

head.title: Get comparison reports for PNG pictures using {{ProdFullName}}.
head.description: The {{ProdFullName}} API generates useful comparison reports for PNG documents in applications that support J2EE and J2SE.

header.title: Comparing PNG pictures using Java
header.description: Empower your Java, J2EE or J2SE applications with {{ProdShortName}} API. Retrieve detailed information about any changes at your PNG pictures.

about.title: Be informed about {{ProdFullName}} API features
about.content: {{ProdShortName}} developed as a native Java API suitable for composing detailed reports based on variations among different versions of images represented in PNG format. Not only PNG format is supported. A lot of image formats are supported by our API.

content.title: Compare PNG files with [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) and retrieve relevant report about their alterations
content.step_2: Provide Comparer instance and pass path to PNG
content.step_3: Add PNG files for further comparison

comments.comment_1: Get report with information about distinctions between PNG
comments.comment_2: Get Comparer object with main file path
comments.comment_3: Append PNG pictures to be compared

formats.title: Find distinctions at different versions of PNG images via {{ProgLang}}
formats.description: {{ProdFullName}} API tracks alterations inside PNG pictures and composes demonstrative reports for further analyzing.
